Our Advantage

We don’t just consult — we partner. Our mission is to help you move forward with clarity, strategy, and measurable results.

We Know the Market

We understand how business works in Libya and Tunisia — from market trends and pricing to local regulations and business culture.

We Have the Right Connections

We work directly with trusted developers, owners, and decision-makers — giving you access to real opportunities and smoother execution.

We Are Independent and Reliable

We work only for our clients. Our advice is clear, honest, and confidential — focused on long-term results.

Meet the Team

Wealthwave Consulting is an independent advisory firm that helps investors and businesses succeed in Libya and Tunisia. We specialise in market research, financial modeling, valuation, and investment support.
